schedule.title: Registration & Welcome Coffee
schedule.description: Check-in, networking breakfast, and event materials distribution

schedule.title: Opening Ceremony
schedule.description: Official welcome address, event overview, and keynote introduction

schedule.title: Keynote: Future of AI in Industry
schedule.description: Exploring the transformative impact of artificial intelligence on modern businesses and career opportunities in tech

schedule.title: Technical Workshops - Session 1
schedule.description: Parallel hands-on workshops covering web development, mobile apps, and data science fundamentals

schedule.title: Networking Lunch
schedule.description: Enjoy lunch while connecting with fellow students, industry professionals, and potential employers

schedule.title: Company Booths & Career Fair
schedule.description: Explore career opportunities, submit CVs, conduct interviews, and learn about internship programs

schedule.title: Panel Discussion: Industry Trends
schedule.description: Interactive panel featuring CEOs and tech leaders discussing current market trends and future career paths

schedule.title: Closing Ceremony & Awards
schedule.description: Recognition of outstanding participants, closing remarks, and announcement of next year's event
